problem.script:
import vectordraw
### Custom Checks ### custom_checks = {}
success_message = 'Good job!'
grader = vectordraw.Grader(success_message, custom_checks)
problem.p: The velocity of a car is measured at several different times and the recorded data are plotted below. Draw a best fit line to approximate these data, and determine the car's acceleration and its velocity at time \(t=0\).)
